summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Milestone 3 - Complete Inspection Management System. Backend APIs 100% functional, frontend UI fully working with successful end-to-end workflow testing. All core features tested: template CRUD, question types, scoring system, photo upload, inspection execution, and completion workflow.

minor_issues.issue: Password validation returns 400 instead of expected 422 for short passwords

navigation_issues.issue: Inspections link not visible in main navigation menu

passed_tests: Frontend: Inspections page loads with correct stats display
Frontend: Template creation workflow with all form fields
Frontend: Template builder with question types and settings
Frontend: Template saving and return to inspections page
Frontend: Inspection execution page loads correctly
Frontend: Findings and notes input fields
Frontend: Stats update after completion (Completed Today: 2, Pass Rate: 100%)
Integration: Complete end-to-end workflow from template creation to inspection completion
Integration: Photo upload to GridFS working
Integration: Scoring system calculating 100% pass rate
Integration: Database persistence across all operations
